I would recommend "What Women Want," a romantic comedy directed by Richard Gere and released in 2000.

The movie follows the story of a cocky, chauvinistic advertising executive who magically acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking.

As he tries to navigate this new world, he meets a beautiful young woman named Carol who is just as baffled by this strange new world that she has suddenly found herself in.

As they struggle to understand each other and the strange new world that they have suddenly found themselves in, they begin to form an unlikely bond of friendship and understanding.

In the end, despite their initial differences and misunderstandings, they are able to come together and form an unlikely bond of friendship and understanding.
